headline.print_headline: Russian Tanks Flatten East Ukrainian Town, Ukraine Military Says
headline.main: Russian Tanks Flatten East Ukrainian Town, Ukraine Military Says

lead_paragraph: Ukraine's military said on Saturday its forces had pulled out of areas to the east of the border-area city of Luhansk under pressure from Russian-backed rebels and that Russian tanks had been used to "destroy virtually every house" in one small town.
